cast.name: 谢妮亚·席伯格 Xenia Seeberg

introduction: The film was shot in the genre of black and tells mockery of life and death of a young girl who are drug addicts, with her first emotional turmoil before the tragic events, culminating in death by misadventure. The film ridiculed social problems, including drug addiction and attempts to treat numerous polusharlatanskih rehabilitation clinics. The story behind the numerous glasses of vodka with ice is not quite sober witness to the life of Hilda Humphrey - Mrs. Fifsi.This role is played by well-known German actress Patricia Moresco.Warning Main role in this movie performed Xenia Seeberg, who played in the series Lexx role Zev!It is seen Xenia in this film, Paul Donovan, invited her to appear in TV series Lexx replace departed from the draft Eva Habermann.In 1996, the American director of the Idaho Nick Lyon shot a video for the album of the German team from Stuttgart "Farmer Boys" - "Countrified". A guest vocalist on the track # 9 Never Let Me Down Again (Depeche mode cover) was Anneke van Giersbergen, singer from Holland. Nick Lyons, invited to appear in the clip young German actress Xenia Seeberg, which at that time actively posed for magazines in America.Production land: GermanyRun time: 21 min
